branchCategory.name: 11-C(D)RA1, Rack & Pinion Rotary Actuator, Clean Series
branchCategory.description: <P>The 11-CRA1 rack & pinion rotary actuator (clean series) offers very high torque-to-size and accurate positioning. Bore sizes are 30 and 50mm. Units may be ordered auto-switch capable and with cushions. Basic or flange mounting styles available.  Single shaft end or double shaft end models are available.    </P>
